title: Main export partners of Germany 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share in total exports for 9 number of Countrys.
The Share in total exports is appeared to be the highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Switzerland.
The maximum Country United States has got 2.1 times higher Share in total exports than the minimum Country Switzerland.
min_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share in total exports in each Country on the y axis.
The Share in total exports is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Switzerland.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share in total exports for 9 number of Countrys.
The Share in total exports is appeared to be the highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Switzerland.
The maximum Country United States has got 2.1 times higher Share in total exports than the minimum Country Switzerland.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share in total exports for 9 number of Countrys.
The Share in total exports is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Switzerland.
Second maximum Share in total exports is found at Country France.
The highest Country United States has 4.6 more Share in total exports than the lowest Country Switzerland.
Share in total exports at Country United States is 8.8 , second place is France at 8.2, and thirdly is China at 6.8.
The Country United States has 1.41 times more Share in total exports than average.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 56.0.
